en.#ness-law-page-title: Specialised solutions for the legal sector
en.#ness-law-description-p01: Have you ever heard of lawtechs?
en.#ness-law-description-p02: Just like how fintechs – a hybrid between finance and technology – are revolutionizing the financial and banking sectors in Brazil, lawtechs have been gaining momentum in the legal industry.
en.#ness-law-description-p03: NESS Law delivers specialized tech-based solutions for the legal sector.

pt.#ness-law-description-p01: Você já ouviu falar das lawtechs?
pt.#ness-law-description-p02: Assim como as fintechs - combinação de finanças e tecnologias - estão transformando o setor financeiro e bancário no Brasil, as lawtechs estão ganhando força no mercado jurídico.
pt.#ness-law-description-p03: Desse modo, a NESS Law proporciona soluções especializadas com base tecnológica para o setor jurídico.
